Package tiled.mapeditor.actions

Class Summary
AbstractFileAction This abstract file action asks to save the map if it has been modified.
AbstractLayerAction Provides a common abstract class for actions that modify the layer configuration.
AddLayerAction Adds a layer to the current map and selects it.
AddObjectGroupAction Adds a object group layer to the current map and selects it.
CloneLayerAction Clones the current layer, adds the clone to the map at the top of the layer stack and then selects it.
CloseMapAction Closes the currently opened map.
DeleteLayerAction Deletes the selected layer and selects the layer that takes the same index.
ExitAction Exits the map editor.
MergeAllLayersAction Merges all layers of the map.
MergeLayerDownAction Merges the current layer with the one below and selects the merged layer.
MoveLayerDownAction Swaps the currently selected layer with the layer below.
MoveLayerUpAction Swaps the currently selected layer with the layer above.
NewMapAction Creates a new map.
OpenMapAction Opens the map open dialog.
OpenRecentAction Opens one of the recently open maps.
SaveAction Tries to save the file if a filepath is already set in the main app, otherwise prompts for a filename.
SaveAsAction A save action that always shows a file chooser.
SaveAsImageAction Saves the map to an image.
